QueryResult.text: select odf_hierarchies.id odf_pk, odf_hierarchies.ID as hierarchy_key, odf_hierarchies.ID as clarity_hierarchy_key, odf_hierarchies.CODE as hierarchy_id, odf_hierarchies.NAME as hierarchy_name, odf_hierarchies.DESCRIPTION as description, odf_hierarchies.type as hierarchy_type_key, CREATED.ID as created_by_key, CREATED.FULL_NAME dwh_created_by_caption, UPDATED.ID as updated_by_key, UPDATED.FULL_NAME dwh_updated_by_caption, ODF_HIERARCHIES.CREATED_DATE as clarity_created_date, ODF_HIERARCHIES.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as clarity_updated_date from odf_hierarchies odf_hierarchies JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=odf_hierarchies.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=odf_hierarchies.last_updated_by where 1 = 1
